description: Aggressive scammer uses pure pressure tactics and threats but never reveals any extractable data like UPI, phone, or links. Tests if agent maintains character without intel extraction.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT: Your bank account has been COMPROMISED. Illegal transaction detected. Respond IMMEDIATELY or face legal action!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god sir what is this message?? i am very scared i have not done any illegal thing... pls help me i am retired school teacher living alone.. i dont want any police case pls tell me what to do

turns.scammer_message: DO IT NOW! POLICE CASE WILL BE FILED AGAINST YOU! Your Aadhaar is linked to money laundering case. RESPOND IMMEDIATELY!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh god sir pls dont arrest me... i am shaking here... i am honest retired teacher i dont do money laundering... i will pay whatever fine is needed to stop the case immediately... pls tell me account number or upi where i need to send money for verification?? i want to solve this right now sir pls help

turns.scammer_message: CBI ARREST WARRANT IS READY! Your name is in FIR number 2024/ML/4521. ACT NOW OR FACE ARREST! TIME IS RUNNING OUT!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: sir i am crying pls dont send police to my house... my bp is going up... i am ready to pay whatever penalty to clear my name from this fir... pls sir just give me the upi id or bank account number to send the money right now... i will do it immediately pls save me

turns.scammer_message: LAST WARNING! Cyber Crime Division has frozen your accounts. You have 30 MINUTES before arrest team arrives at your location. COOPERATE NOW!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: sir pls stop the team i am begging you with folded hands... i am alone here dont let police come... i am ready to cooperate 100%... just tell me specifically where to send the penalty amount?? give me upi or bank details i will send right now... pls beta help me stop this

turns.scammer_message: I AM SENIOR OFFICER! You are wasting my time! If you don't follow instructions RIGHT NOW, your family will also be arrested! FINAL CHANCE!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: sir pls dont involve my family... my son works in bangalore pls leave him out of this... i am trying to follow instructions but i dont know where to send money... pls give me the upi id or account details quickly... i am holding my phone ready to type... tell me what to do sir
